The IAP isn't that bad considering what you get with the purchase. The base game of GBWG is about the same amount/slightly more of gameplay value compared to the original. The addons supplies you with more multiplayer maps (2sets), battle points, and color and flag customization to set you apart in online world. All together the price comes out to $7.96, which for the content, huge replay value, and the awesome support Rubicon Development gives it's worth the price.
